You will be guaranteed strict 
confidentiality.	You	can	find

If	you	are	under	19,	you	can	
visit Common Youth to get 
free,	confidential	advice.	To	
find	your	nearest	centre,	visit	
www.commonyouth.com 
or email
hello@commonyouth.com
